name: PDF Invoices for Gravity Forms
author: KaisarAhmmed

sections.description:
Automatically generate PDF invoices and attach them to every form submission in Gravity Forms. This is the ultimate self-hosted solution for dynamically creating PDF invoices. It’s easy to set up in just 3 minutes. Simply add your billing details in the settings and configure the form fields in Gravity Forms feeds. The plugin will automatically generate invoices from the pricing fields in Gravity Forms.

☞ Main features

  • Automatically attach PDF invoice to email notification
  • Download and view PDF invoices form gravity forms entries.
  • Invoice Format, prefix and invoice file name.
  • Company address information and more.

Requirements

  • PHP 5.6 or higher
  • Gravity Forms 2.6.0 or higher
sections.installation: Installation is fairly straight forward. Install it from the WordPress plugin repository.
